participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Evelyn enjoys reflecting on her experiences and values learning.
participant_1.background: I would not be able to work as a librarian if I were blind. My mother was a single mother. I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet. I used to be more spontaneous with my painting. I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, Marcus loves to explore the social scene and express himself through photography.
participant_2.background: I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older. I enjoy dressing up to go out clubbing. My family is not well off and I wish I could go to a better school. I wish that I lived in the city. I cherish my camera because it allows me to express my creativity.

content.text: What's your favorite genre of music?
I like everything, but I do listen to more mainstream music.
What's your favorite type of food?
I like to dress up and go out clubbing.
I don't like going to clubs. I have a small group of friends and we just hang out at home.
That sounds fun too. I love to hang out with my friends and play games.
I'm not a big gamer. I like to read and paint.
I like to read too. I love to read fantasy novels.
I like to read nonfiction books. I like to learn new things.
I like to learn new things too. I wish I could go to a better school.
You can always go back to school. It's never too late to learn.
I don't have the money for that.
I don't know how to do that.
You can look online or talk to your guidance counselor.
I'll look into it. Thanks for the advice.
